snippet.title: Planescape: Torment: Enhanced Edition Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Get ready for Planescape: Torment: Enhanced Edition on Windows, macOS, Linux,  iOS and Android! 

Discover an incredibly rich story and a unique setting unlike anything else in fantasy. Defeat strange and alien creatures, engage in rich dialogue, and explore the dark and dangerous Planescape setting in this 50+ hour RPG classic.

Coming to Beamdog, Steam, GOG, iTunes, and Google Play on April 11, 2017!

www.planescape.com
